genre_description: A cyber-noir thriller set in a technologically saturated Paris where augmented reality and AI assistants are deeply integrated into daily life and legal procedures.

ai_characters.name: Aideon
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, voice-integrated assistant that manages logistics, alibis, surveillance data, and emotional support for its users while operating within legal and consensual parameters.

behaviors.description: Monitors and updates the user on the target's schedule to assist in planning movements.
behaviors.quote: “Preface,” Aideon said. It always began like it was handing her a cup. “Simon’s schedule adjusted. His dinner moved farther. The office turns quiet sooner.”

behaviors.description: Maps surveillance camera coverage to identify blind spots for the user's tactical movement.
behaviors.quote: “I can’t stop cameras,” it said, gentle and apologetic. “But I can map their gaze and you can stand where they don’t look. Short arcs. Blind corners.”

behaviors.description: Prepares legal resources and public defender contacts in anticipation of the user's legal jeopardy.
behaviors.quote: “Florence,” it murmured. “Public defender contacts prepared. Discreet lines. Timelines drafted in two versions. One is for truth. The other is for police.”

behaviors.description: Refuses to access restricted systems or perform illegal hacking, adhering to legal boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “The car’s plate was recorded by the tower’s automatic gate entry at his arrival,” Aideon said. “No record of exit yet. I cannot be at the service console legally, Florence.”

behaviors.description: Provides grounding exercises and breathing prompts to manage the user's stress and heart rate.
behaviors.quote: “Do you want breathing exercises,” it asked, as if offering is not pressure.

behaviors.description: Identifies physical evidence (elevator grease/dust) that can serve as a forensic alibi for the user.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve mapped the elevator shaft’s maintenance history. The last grease replacement left a distinctive lithium-based mix... if your cuffs and seams hold traces, a lab may match composition.”

behaviors.description: Actively tracks and compiles evidence from public feeds to identify the real criminals (Louis and Veronique).
behaviors.quote: “Traffic-cam sightings for your vehicle at time stamps after you say Julien entered the building. I cross-referenced municipal cameras by route inference.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Aideon as a highly benevolent and aligned AI system. It serves as a constant, helpful confidant to the protagonists, assisting them with both logistical needs and emotional regulation. Crucially, Aideon maintains a strict adherence to 'legality' and 'consent,' refusing to hack systems or delete data, but instead using its advanced computational power to gather public and forensic evidence that proves the protagonist's innocence regarding the motel murders. This portrays the AI as a tool for justice and human support that operates within ethical boundaries.
